description: CSS file defining styles and variables for a theme management system in a React application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with center-aligned text and dynamic background color based on theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application with minimum height, flex layout, and dynamic background color.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styled link element that changes color based on the theme.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between themes with dynamic styling and animations.
